condition.description:
Triglycerides are a type of fat found in your blood. Too much of this type of fat may raise the risk of coronary artery disease, especially in women.

A blood test measures your triglycerides along with your cholesterol. Normal triglyceride levels are below 150. Levels above 200 are high.

Factors that can raise your triglyceride level include

  • Being overweight
  • Lack of physical activity
  • Smoking
  • Excessive alcohol use
  • A very high carbohydrate diet
  • Certain diseases and medicines
  • Some genetic disorders

You may be able to lower your triglycerides with a combination of losing weight, diet, and exercise. You also may need to take medicine to lower your triglycerides.

NIH: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
condition.name: High triglycerides

carousel_items: Lowers triglycerides.
Can cause backache or headache.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle or abdominal pain.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol while taking this medicine.
Also taking Welchol or Questran? Take this medicine at least 1 hour before or 6 hours after.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

basics.benefits_moa: Antara is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. It removes triglycerides from your body and makes it easier to process "bad" cholesterol (LDL). This also increases "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Antara is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but it's not as good as statins for improving cholesterol.
downsides: In studies, it didn't lower heart disease in people with Type 2 diabetes.
According to new guidelines, you shouldn't take this medicine by itself to lower cholesterol.
Drinking large amounts of alcohol regularly can raise your risk of liver damage.
Different forms and strengths of this medication can't be substituted for each other.

downsides_processed.orig: In studies, it didn't lower heart disease in people with Type 2 diabetes.
According to new guidelines, you shouldn't take this medicine by itself to lower cholesterol.
Drinking large amounts of alcohol regularly can raise your risk of liver damage.
Different forms and strengths of this medication can't be substituted for each other.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.

drugs.name: Antara

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers triglycerides.
Can cause backache or headache.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle or abdominal pain.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol while taking this medicine.
Also taking Welchol or Questran? Take this medicine at least 1 hour before or 6 hours after.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: People on Antara while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

description_processed.orig: People on Antara while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Reports of liver damage have been reported in people who take Antara, especially in people with a history of liver disease. Your doctor may monitor your liver with blood tests on a regular basis.

description_processed.orig: Reports of liver damage have been reported in people who take Antara, especially in people with a history of liver disease. Your doctor may monitor your liver with blood tests on a regular basis.

risks_warnings.title: Gallstones
risks_warnings.description: People on Antara have reported gallstones while on this medication. Contact your prescriber if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

description_processed.orig: People on Antara have reported gallstones while on this medication. Contact your prescriber if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

risks_warnings.title: Increased bleeding risk
risks_warnings.description: People on anticoagulants such as Coumadin while on Antara may have increased INR/PT on blood tests, which may mean increased bleeding risk. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

description_processed.orig: People on anticoagulants such as Coumadin while on Antara may have increased INR/PT on blood tests, which may mean increased bleeding risk. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

risks_warnings.title: Pancreatitis
risks_warnings.description: People on Antara have reported pancreatitis while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

description_processed.orig: People on Antara have reported pancreatitis while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in blood tests
risks_warnings.description: Reports of decreased red blood cell and white blood cell counts have been seen in people on Antara. Your doctor may check your blood.

description_processed.orig: Reports of decreased red blood cell and white blood cell counts have been seen in people on Antara. Your doctor may check your blood.

risks_warnings.title: Skin reactions
risks_warnings.description: People on Antara have reported serious skin reactions, which may lead to death. This has been very rare. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop a sudden fever and a blistering rash.

description_processed.orig: People on Antara have reported serious skin reactions, which may lead to death. This has been very rare. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop a sudden fever and a blistering rash.

risks_warnings.title: Blood clots
risks_warnings.description: People on Antara have reported blood clots in the arms or legs (deep vein thrombosis) or in the lungs (pulmonary embolus). This has been very rare. If you develop sudden pain or redness in one arm or leg, contact your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: People on Antara have reported blood clots in the arms or legs (deep vein thrombosis) or in the lungs (pulmonary embolus). This has been very rare. If you develop sudden pain or redness in one arm or leg, contact your doctor immediately.

Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever or weakness.

clock.tip: Works faster on an empty stomach.

basics.benefits_moa: Atorvastatin is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Atorvastatin is a good medication to improve your cholesterol. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Eating a lot of grapefruit can raise your risk of liver damage.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Eating a lot of grapefruit can raise your risk of liver damage.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.
One of the strongest cholesterol-lowering statin medications.
A good option for people who have high cholesterol and diabetes.

Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.
One of the strongest cholesterol-lowering statin medications.
A good option for people who have high cholesterol and diabetes.

carousel_items: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Don't take antacids for at least 2 hours before and after taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever, or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.

basics.benefits_moa: Crestor is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Crestor is one of the most effective statins to improve cholesterol, but it's expensive. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.

Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.

Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Slows down the buildup of fatty deposits in your blood vessels, otherwise known as hardening of the arteries.
In clinical studies, Crestor has the strongest effect on lowering "bad" cholesterol compared to other statins.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Slows down the buildup of fatty deposits in your blood vessels, otherwise known as hardening of the arteries.
In clinical studies, Crestor has the strongest effect on lowering "bad" cholesterol compared to other statins.
Can lower the risk of heart attack, stroke, and death, particularly if you have diabetes, high blood pressure, obesity, or a history of smoking.

only problem is the price.  can't take most statins since i take erythromycin regularly for gastroparesis.
I was taking 10 mg. Had some aches in arm may or may not have been related.  Went to 5 mg. No aches. Cholesterol is good. Also worked on diet and exercise

Stopped taking it after suffering Rhabdomyolysis which attacks the muscles and kidneys.  I had no symptoms to warn me until the damage to muscles was done. Proved to be a very dangerous drug for me..Keep check of blood CK levels if using it
Taking it with evening meal helps me remember to take it

carousel_items: Take Gemfibrozil two times a day, 30 minutes before your breakfast and dinner.
Don't drink alcohol while taking this medication.
Can cause heartburn, stomach pain, and diarrhea.
Follow a diet and exercise plan to help lower your triglyceride and cholesterol levels.

basics.benefits_moa: Gemfibrozil is a fibric acid medication that lowers the levels of triglycerides in your blood, while raising the levels of good cholesterols.
basics.bottom_line: Gemfibrozil is a generically available medication that can lower triglyceride levels by up to 50%.
downsides: While Gemfibrozil has been shown to lower triglycerides, it has not been shown by itself to reduce the number of deaths caused by high cholesterol.
Can't be used with statins to lower cholesterol because of the risk of muscle and kidney damage.

downsides_processed.orig: While Gemfibrozil has been shown to lower triglycerides, it has not been shown by itself to reduce the number of deaths caused by high cholesterol.
Can't be used with statins to lower cholesterol because of the risk of muscle and kidney damage.

upsides: Considered as a first choice medication for lowering triglyceride levels in the blood. Studies have shown it can reduce triglycerides by up to 50%.
Available as a generic.
Can be used with other medications, such as fish oil, to lower bad cholesterol and increase good cholesterol.

upsides_processed.orig: Considered as a first choice medication for lowering triglyceride levels in the blood. Studies have shown it can reduce triglycerides by up to 50%.
Available as a generic.
Can be used with other medications, such as fish oil, to lower bad cholesterol and increase good cholesterol.

basics.benefits_moa: Simvastatin is cholesterol-lowering medicine called a statin. It lowers the amount of cholesterol your body makes, which helps lower "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Simvastatin is a good medication to improve your cholesterol. Statin side effects can be difficult to deal with, but the benefits might outweigh the risks.
downsides: Statins can cause digestive problems, blood sugar problems, muscle aches and stiffness, muscle injury, kidney damage, and liver damage. Some people have to stop taking this medicine because of these problems.

You're at higher risk for these side effects if you are female, are 65 years or older, drink alcohol every day, take more than one medicine for cholesterol, or have liver disease, kidney disease, or diabetes.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

drugs.name: Simvastatin

labeled_indications.indication: Heart protection for people with high risk

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides, and raises good cholesterol.
Most people reach their target cholesterol levels in 4 to 6 weeks.
Avoid grapefruit and grapefruit juice while taking this medicine.
Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, fever, or weakness.
Tell your doctor if you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin.
Certain medications can interact with this drug. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: There are rare cases of muscle damage leading to kidney failure in people taking Simvastatin. The risk is greater in people with kidney disease or thyroid disease, are older and female and taking certain cholesterol-lowering medication combinations. Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, weakness or fever and there is no known cause.
risk_factors: Combining Simvastatin with certain cholesterol-lowering drugs

description_processed.orig: There are rare cases of muscle damage leading to kidney failure in people taking Simvastatin. The risk is greater in people with kidney disease or thyroid disease, are older and female and taking certain cholesterol-lowering medication combinations. Tell your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain, weakness or fever and there is no known cause.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of liver damage in people who take Simvastatin, especially if they are heavy alcohol drinkers or have a history of liver disease. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, tell your doctor. Your doctor may also want to check your liver function periodically.

description_processed.orig: There are reports of liver damage in people who take Simvastatin, especially if they are heavy alcohol drinkers or have a history of liver disease. If you notice dark urine or yellowing of the eyes or skin, tell your doctor. Your doctor may also want to check your liver function periodically.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Don't use while pregnant it can harm your unborn baby. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Don't use while pregnant it can harm your unborn baby. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Drug interactions
risks_warnings.description: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis) and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.
risk_factors: Certain drugs can increase the dose of Simvastatin in the body

description_processed.orig: Combining certain medications can increase the risk of muscle pain (myopathy), muscle damage (rhabdomyolysis) and kidney damage. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist when taking any new medications.

risks_warnings.title: High blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: Simvastatin can increase fasting (short-term) and HbA1c (long-term) blood sugar levels. Your doctor may need to check your blood sugar levels periodically.

description_processed.orig: Simvastatin can increase fasting (short-term) and HbA1c (long-term) blood sugar levels. Your doctor may need to check your blood sugar levels periodically.

points.hlt: gastrointestinal and abdominal pains (excl oral and throat)

carousel_items: Can be used with other medications to help lower cholesterol.
Lowers triglycerides.
Can raise your chance of getting colds and flu.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle or abdominal pain.
Also taking Welchol or Questran? Take this medicine at least 2 hours before or 4 hours after.

basics.benefits_moa: Trilipix is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. It removes triglycerides from your body and makes it easier to process "bad" cholesterol (LDL). This also increases "good" cholesterol (HDL).
basics.bottom_line: Trilipix is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but it's not as good as statins for improving cholesterol and cardiovascular disease risk.
downsides: In clinical studies, Trilipix hasn't lowered cholesterol or the risk of heart attack and stroke better than statins.
Different forms and strengths of this medication can't be substituted for each other.

downsides_processed.orig: In clinical studies, Trilipix hasn't lowered cholesterol or the risk of heart attack and stroke better than statins.
Different forms and strengths of this medication can't be substituted for each other.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Good medicine for lowering triglycerides.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and triglycerides (fats) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Good medicine for lowering triglycerides.

drugs.name: Trilipix

labeled_indications.indication: High cholesterol in people with heart disease risk

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can be used with other medications to help lower cholesterol.
Lowers triglycerides.
Can raise your chance of getting colds and flu.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle or abdominal pain.
Also taking Welchol or Questran? Take this medicine at least 2 hours before or 4 hours after.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: Reports of liver damage have been reported in people who take Trilipix, especially in people with a history of liver disease. Your doctor may monitor your liver with blood tests on a regular basis.

description_processed.orig: Reports of liver damage have been reported in people who take Trilipix, especially in people with a history of liver disease. Your doctor may monitor your liver with blood tests on a regular basis.

risks_warnings.title: Gallstones
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix have reported gallstones while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix have reported gallstones while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

risks_warnings.title: Increased bleeding risk
risks_warnings.description: People on anticoagulants such as Coumadin while on Trilipix may have increased INR/PT on blood tests, which may mean increased bleeding risk. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

description_processed.orig: People on anticoagulants such as Coumadin while on Trilipix may have increased INR/PT on blood tests, which may mean increased bleeding risk. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

risks_warnings.title: Pancreatitis
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix have reported pancreatitis while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix have reported pancreatitis while on this medication. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden abdominal pain.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in blood tests
risks_warnings.description: Reports of decreased red blood cell and white blood cell counts have been seen in people on Trilipix. Your doctor may run blood tests to check your blood.

description_processed.orig: Reports of decreased red blood cell and white blood cell counts have been seen in people on Trilipix. Your doctor may run blood tests to check your blood.

risks_warnings.title: Skin reactions
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix have reported serious skin reactions, which may lead to death. This has been very rare. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop a sudden fever and a blistering rash.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix have reported serious skin reactions, which may lead to death. This has been very rare. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop a sudden fever and a blistering rash.

risks_warnings.title: Blood clots
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix have reported blood clots in the arms or legs (deep vein thrombosis) or in the lungs (pulmonary embolus). This has been very rare. If you develop sudden pain or redness in one arm or leg, contact your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix have reported blood clots in the arms or legs (deep vein thrombosis) or in the lungs (pulmonary embolus). This has been very rare. If you develop sudden pain or redness in one arm or leg, contact your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk for colds and flu
risks_warnings.description: People on Trilipix have reported getting colds and the flu more often. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: People on Trilipix have reported getting colds and the flu more often. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor.

carousel_items: Take it at bedtime with a low-fat snack.
Avoid alcohol, spicy foods, and hot beverages right before you take this medicine.
Can cause flushing.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle pain.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

basics.benefits_moa: niacin is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to lower the amount of "bad" cholesterol (LDL) made by the liver. It may also help your body process cholesterol.
basics.bottom_line: niacin is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but it's not as good as statins for improving cholesterol.
downsides: By itself, niacin is not as effective as statins for improving cholesterol.
Can cause flushing and stomach pain or discomfort.
You have to take it before bedtime with a low-fat snack.
If you don't take it regularly, you might have to re-start the medicine at a lower dose.

downsides_processed.orig: By itself, niacin is not as effective as statins for improving cholesterol.
Can cause flushing and stomach pain or discomfort.
You have to take it before bedtime with a low-fat snack.
If you don't take it regularly, you might have to re-start the medicine at a lower dose.

upsides: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Lowers the risk of a second heart attack.
Good for lowering triglycerides (fats).

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers "bad" cholesterol (LDL) and raises "good" cholesterol (HDL) in people who have trouble doing this through diet and exercise.
Lowers the risk of a second heart attack.
Good for lowering triglycerides (fats).

drugs.name: Niaspan

labeled_indications.indication: Recurrent heart attack prevention with high cholesterol

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it at bedtime with a low-fat snack.
Avoid alcohol, spicy foods, and hot beverages right before you take this medicine.
Can cause flushing.
Call your doctor if you develop muscle pain.
Don't stop taking this medicine suddenly.

risks_warnings.title: Muscle pain
risks_warnings.description: People on Niacin while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

description_processed.orig: People on Niacin while taking statins have reported muscle pain which may lead to muscle and kidney damage. This has been very rare. Talk to your doctor if you develop sudden muscle pain or weakness or fever and you don't know why.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: People who take Niacin have reported liver damage, especially if taken with statins or if you drink large amounts of alcohol. This has been rare. Talk to your doctor if you've ever had liver disease as they may discuss alternatives, or they may monitor your liver with blood tests.

description_processed.orig: People who take Niacin have reported liver damage, especially if taken with statins or if you drink large amounts of alcohol. This has been rare. Talk to your doctor if you've ever had liver disease as they may discuss alternatives, or they may monitor your liver with blood tests.

risks_warnings.title: High blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: People with diabetes may have increases in their blood sugar levels while taking Niacin, especially during the first few months of taking this medication. Your doctor will work closely with you to see if changes to your diabetes medications are needed.

description_processed.orig: People with diabetes may have increases in their blood sugar levels while taking Niacin, especially during the first few months of taking this medication. Your doctor will work closely with you to see if changes to your diabetes medications are needed.

risks_warnings.title: Low platelets
risks_warnings.description: People on anticoagulants while on Niacin may have decreases in their platelet counts on blood tests. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

description_processed.orig: People on anticoagulants while on Niacin may have decreases in their platelet counts on blood tests. Tell your doctor if you are on anticoagulants, as they may have to monitor your blood and adjust your medications.

carousel_items: Lowers triglycerides.
Take it with food.
Swallow capsules whole.
Can cause burping and changes in taste.
Don't use if you have an allergy to fish or shellfish.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

basics.benefits_moa: Omega-3 Acid is a cholesterol-lowering medicine. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it may help the liver remove triglycerides from your body, and also prevent your body from making more triglycerides.
basics.bottom_line: Omega-3 Acid is good for lowering triglycerides (fats), but some people can't take it due to allergies.
downsides: You can't take it if you're allergic to fish or shellfish.
You have to take it with food.

downsides_processed.orig: You can't take it if you're allergic to fish or shellfish.
You have to take it with food.

upsides: Lowers triglycerides (fats) when combined with exercise and a low cholesterol diet.
In studies, Omega-3 Acid has lowered the risk of stroke and heart attack leading to death, especially in people with high cholesterol or high triglycerides.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers triglycerides (fats) when combined with exercise and a low cholesterol diet.
In studies, Omega-3 Acid has lowered the risk of stroke and heart attack leading to death, especially in people with high cholesterol or high triglycerides.

drugs.name: Omega 3 Acid

carousel_items_processed.orig: Lowers triglycerides.
Take it with food.
Swallow capsules whole.
Can cause burping and changes in taste.
Don't use if you have an allergy to fish or shellfish.
You should use this medicine in combination with a healthy diet.

risks_warnings.title: Allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: If you know you are allergic to fish or shellfish, talk to your doctor as Omega-3 Acid is made from different types of fish and shellfish. They may prescribe an alternative.

description_processed.orig: If you know you are allergic to fish or shellfish, talk to your doctor as Omega-3 Acid is made from different types of fish and shellfish. They may prescribe an alternative.

risks_warnings.title: Heart flutter
risks_warnings.description: If you have had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation, talk to your doctor, as Omega-3 Acid may cause heart flutters, especially during the first few months of taking Omega-3 Acid.

description_processed.orig: If you have had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation, talk to your doctor, as Omega-3 Acid may cause heart flutters, especially during the first few months of taking Omega-3 Acid.
